alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 12 at 8:24PM EDT until July 12 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL FAYETTE AND EAST CENTRAL RALEIGH COUNTIES... At 824 PM EDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding in spots across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Beckley, Mabscott, Sophia, Daniels, Stanaford, Beaver, Shady Spring, Piney View, Macarthur, Prosperity, Dry Creek, Crab Orchard, Coal City and Lester. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
